result.title: 1st participation of the Moroccan team in the International Olympiads in Informatics â€” Need Support of the CF community
result.content:
Friends,

4 high school Moroccan students qualified to the International Olympiad in Informatics. This is Morocco's first participation in the IOI. The event is scheduled for the 28th of this month and it is going to take place in Tehran, Iran. It is unfortunate that they are facing financial issues and this might jeopardize their participation in the Olympiad. We are trying to collect some money to cover airfare for them (6 flight tickets to Tehran which is around 5000 Euros). You can help by contributing and/or by sharing the link :)

Link: https://www.leetchi.com/c/association-de-association-marocaine-de-confiance-numerique-aman
